department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: National Master Standing Offer for Plastic Small
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
**Tender Title:** Plastic Buoys for Marine Transportation and Recreational Boating
**Reference Number:** PW_ERD-008-29331
**Publication Date:** 29 March 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** 10 July 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services, Category GD
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Background:**
Fisheries and Oceans Canada require Plastic Buoys for their Short-range Aids to Navigation (AtoN) Program. The Buoys will be used to provide safety in marine transportation and recreational boating.

**Tender Description:**
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is used to establish a National Master Standing Offer for Plastic Small Buoys for the requirement described in the RFP, for designated users across Canada, excluding the areas covered by Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA). Any delivery requirements to areas covered by CLCA in the Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, or Labrador will be treated as separate tenders outside this RFP.

**Required Documents:**
The tender documents can be downloaded from the Buyandsell.gc.ca website. Solicitation amendments will be posted online. It is the Offeror’s responsibility to ensure all amendments are obtained and addressed in the submitted proposal. Offers may not be accepted if submitted by facsimile, email, or other means.

**Contact Information:**
For additional information or to obtain a copy of this Notice, please contact:
Maya Bakhos
Public Works and Government Services Canada
(873) 355-3085
Maya.Bakhos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Status:** This tender is expired. Offers may not be submitted after the closing date.

Note: The text has been shortened and reformatted for clarity. All information necessary for a tender has been included.
